videos.title: 🔍 How to Convert Struct to JSON in Go (Fast & Easy!)
videos.description:
Learn how to convert a Go struct into JSON in the simplest way using the `encoding/json` package:

✅ Perfect for beginners
✅ Demonstrates simple struct conversion
✅ Error handling included
✅ Clean and readable code

#golang #json #programming #coding #shorts #godev #softwareengineering

videos.title: 🎯 Fix This Common JSON Mistake in Go! (Struct Tags Explained)
videos.description:
Are your JSON outputs ugly or incorrect? 🤯
Learn how to fix your Go struct output with JSON tags!:

🔹 Customize JSON keys with struct tags
🔹 Use `json.MarshalIndent` for pretty print
🔹 Avoid beginner formatting pitfalls
🔹 Improve API integration clarity

#golang #json #structtags #marshaling #goprogramming #godev #shorts

videos.title: 🧠 Nested Struct to JSON in Go – Simplified!
videos.description:
Ever wondered how to convert nested Go structs into JSON? Here's how!:

🧱 Nesting made simple

🔧 Ideal for complex data modeling
🚀 Great for REST API devs
